questions.title: What is two plus two?
questions.author: Little Mikey
questions.content: I have big math quiz coming up soon. I really need help figuring out this one question. What is two plus two?

questions.title: How do you tie a tie?
questions.author: Bob Johnson
questions.content: I have a job interview. Could somebody help me learn how to tie a tie?

questions.title: Why do my parents hate me?
questions.author: Sammy Slater
questions.content: I just feel like my parents hate me. They force me to go to school and never let me drink Mt.Dew
